channel.title: 🏢 Chongqing University of Technology on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 Chongqing University of Technology on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Boosting the Transferability of Adversarial Attack on Vision Transformer with Adaptive Token Tuning
item.description: Boosting vision transformer adversarial attack transferability, this paper introduces Adaptive Token Tuning (ATT), improving attack success rate by 10.1% over existing methods.
